about_the_game:
“Lips Breaker” is the industry's first Arkanoid game that incorporates facial control technology. It revolutionarily uses the shape of the player's mouth as the instant form of the little ball baffle. In this game, you need to flexibly swing your lips in front of the camera to control the baffle to bounce the little ball, accurately smash the bricks to win. This is not only a challenge to reaction speed and facial expression movements, but also an unprecedented fun experience.

Key features

The game features 8 chapters, 9 levels each, for a total of 72 well-designed levels, each with a unique brick layout and challenges.

Includes:

  • 18 unique props, covering a variety of special effects such as buffs and debuffs.

  • 18 special bricks, diverse in type, with different attributes and effects.

  • 18 mechanism designs, flexibly controlled by facial expressions, highly interactive and fun.

  • 10 creatures (including boss battles), either cute or dangerous, providing a diverse combat experience.

                      

✦Unique face-controlled gameplay✦

The novel face-controlled gameplay provides excellent live broadcast effects. It can also relax the body and mind by freeing up the hands and exercising the facial muscles.

✦Sophisticated control experience✦

The real-time shape of the mouth can be used as a baffle to precisely control the bounce of the ball, testing the player's reaction speed and operating skills.

✦Rich game content and systems✦

In addition to exciting levels, it also offers a thrilling prize machine, an exhaustive illustration book and a colorful skin system.

✦Level editor and creative workshop✦

You can freely use your creativity to design levels and share them in the creative workshop to interact with other players.

✦Global leaderboard✦

Improve your ranking by challenging the fastest clearance time record and compete with players from all over the world.

This is a fun and challenging Arkanoid experience. Whether you are a big fan of Arkanoid games, a game lover who wants to try a new way of playing, or a live streaming expert, you can find your own fun and sense of achievement in this game.
